meta.title: Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
meta.description: NPR's weekly current events quiz. Have a laugh and test your news knowledge while figuring out what's real and what we've made up.
meta.author: NPR
meta.summary: NPR's weekly current events quiz. Have a laugh and test your news knowledge while figuring out what's real and what we've made up.

episodes.title: Ashima Shiraishi
episodes.description: Ashima Shiraishi, mountain climber, joins us along with panelists Jessi Klein, Josh Gondelman, and Negin Farsad.
episodes.summary: Ashima Shiraishi, mountain climber, joins us along with panelists Jessi Klein, Josh Gondelman, and Negin Farsad.

episodes.title: Tony Hawk and Jeff Tweedy
episodes.description: This week we present an around-the-country of WWDTM, along with special guests Tony Hawk and Jeff Tweedy.

episodes.description: Christina Koch, NASA engineer and astronaut, joins us along with panelists Tom Bodett, Alison Leiby, and Maz Jobrani.

episodes.title: Best of Not My Job Feb2020
episodes.description: This week we enjoy past chats with Sean Doolittle, Nalini Nadkarni, Tim Kaine, and Gloria Steinem. And we share some clips that haven't been aired before.
